participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and community-oriented, enjoys helping others and is dedicated to personal causes.
participant_1.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, loves to enjoy life and indulge in leisure activities.
participant_2.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.
